程序包 Controller

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BoardViewController
    This class maps the user's actions in the BoardView to the data and methods in the model.
    LoadMapController
    The Class LoadMapController.
    MenuController
    This class maps the user's actions in the MenuDialog to the data and methods in the model.
    PlayerCountController
    This class maps the user's actions in the PlayerCountDialog to the data and methods in the model.
    PlayerSettingsController
    This class maps the user's actions in the PlayerSettingsDialog to the data and methods in the model.
    Risk_Main
    This class contains the main() method that creates a model, a view, and a controller, passing the model and the view to the controller.
    RiskListController
    This class maps the user's actions in RiskList objects to the data and methods in the model.
    StartViewController
    This class maps the user's actions in the Risk View to the data and methods in the model.
